org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.platform

Interface PlatformBootstrap

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PlatformAbstractBootstrap, PlatformCppBootstrap, PlatformDotNetBootstrap

    public interface PlatformBootstrap
    Platform bootstrap. Responsible for starting Ignite node with non-Java platform.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void init(long dataPtr)
      Init the bootstrap.
      PlatformProcessor start(IgniteConfiguration cfg, GridSpringResourceContext springCtx, long envPtr)
      Start Ignite node.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        PlatformProcessor start(IgniteConfiguration cfg,
                        @Nullable
                        GridSpringResourceContext springCtx,
                        long envPtr)
        Start Ignite node.
        Parameters:
        cfg - Configuration.
        springCtx - Optional Spring resource context.
        envPtr - Environment pointer.
        Returns:
        Platform processor.

      • init

        void init(long dataPtr)
        Init the bootstrap.
        Parameters:
        dataPtr - Optional pointer to additional data required for startup.
